Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_CONASAT4;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.Spacecraft = CONASAT4;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.Filename = 'CONASAT4_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT4.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
